Articles.Content:
Hey folks, first post here. Obviously KSP2 is very early access and rough around the edges at the moment but I'm defo seeing the potential. 

Are there any plans to improve atmospheric effects? Or is what we have currently it? I'm talking proper cloud cover and plume effects based on weather and atmospheric conditions, Kerbal still looks a little cartoony from orbit and it would be nice to see proper big plumes of exhaust on lift off so we get scenes like this...

As its Early Access, I imagine it will be improved in the future, this is version 0.1 after all

The new effects are good, but I get what you mean, especially the with rocket exhausts as they are a bit short (KSP 1 had longer ones)

The launch plumes need to stay there longer and be bigger, I agree
